title: Cs540 vs cs539
body: Can someone explain the difference between the 2 courses?
comments: (In not-asshole responses: 539 is specific to neural nets and their applications, goes more in-depth. 540 is the general AI/ML overview, which touches on ANN but doesn't go into depth.)
Can't speak for 539 but 540 with Sharon/Fred has been a very good class
